title: Understanding Deep Learning Models for Vehicle Detection and Tracking: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computer vision and deep learning concepts, along with foundational Python programming skills
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning, emphasizing conceptual application over complex mathematical understanding

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of STMap-based vehicle detection technology.
Learners can visually analyze vehicle detection models utilizing U-Net architecture and attention mechanisms.
Learners can compare and improve practical applications of vehicle tracking algorithms in constrained environments (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
